description: Building an ecosystem for financial literacy and learning through games like Monopoly and Cashflow boardgame

breakdown.description: Development of digital versions of Monopoly and Cashflow boardgame with financial literacy features
Creation of financial literacy content, including lesson plans and educational materials
Promoting the ecosystem to schools, communities, and individuals
Development of a platform to host and manage the financial literacy ecosystem
Ongoing operations and maintenance of the ecosystem

milestones.name: Content Creation Completion
milestones.description: Completion of financial literacy content creation

milestones.name: Platform Launch
milestones.description: Launch of the financial literacy ecosystem platform

impact.description: Improved financial literacy among individuals, especially youth, leading to better financial decision-making and stability
